%! TEX program = xelatex
\documentclass[tikz, convert]{standalone}
\usepackage[lining]{ebgaramond}
\usepackage[math-style=ISO, bold-style=ISO]{unicode-math}
\setmathfont{Garamond-Math.otf}
\usepackage{pgfplots}
\usetikzlibrary{backgrounds}
\usepgfplotslibrary{dateplot}
\pgfplotsset{compat=1.3}
\input{../src/tex/paultolcolors}

\definecolor{graphicbackground}{rgb}{1,1,1}
\pgfkeys{/tikz/.cd,
  background color/.initial=graphicbackground,
  background color/.get=\backcol,
  background color/.store in=\backcol,
}
\tikzset{background rectangle/.style={
    fill=\backcol,
  },
  use background/.style={
    show background rectangle
  }
}

\pgfplotsset{
  width=14cm, height=7cm,
  scale only axis,
}

\tikzstyle{lines} = [
  line width=1pt,
  mark=*,
  mark size=0.8pt,
]

\begin{document}
  \begin{tikzpicture}[use background]
    \begin{axis}[
      title={\textsc{Progress Tracker}},
      ylabel={words},
      grid=major,
      table/col sep=comma,
      date coordinates in=x,
      % xtick distance=15,
      xticklabel={\day/\month/\year},
      % xmin=2011-10-01, xmax=2020-02-01,
      xticklabel style={rotate=45, anchor=north east},
      legend pos=north west]

      \addplot+[lines] table[x=date, y=total] {wc.dat};
      \addlegendentry{total};
      \addplot+[lines] table[x=date, y=chap] {wc.dat};
      \addlegendentry{\texttt{chap/}};
      \addplot+[lines] table[x=date, y=img] {wc.dat};
      \addlegendentry{\texttt{img/}};
      \addplot+[lines] table[x=date, y=bib] {wc.dat};
      \addlegendentry{\texttt{bib/}};
    \end{axis}
  \end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
